Name: Slijpsteen van Slenaken
description:
Type: Polissoir County/Region: Limburg
Pos Accuracy: 4 (5 is best)
Lat: 50.76615    Long: 5.86945
Polissoir (polishing stone) in Limburg. Stone formation with grooves, used for polishing stone axes, neolithic. Discovered by amateur archeologist in 1953.
